analysis: The project uses a UI component library with custom styling. The current theme appears to be neutral/dark. For a summer mobile-responsive theme, we need to introduce lighter colors, rounded corners, better spacing, and mobile-friendly layouts. The CSS and component files will reveal the current styling approach and what needs to be modified for a summer aesthetic.
